text: Claudia Giannotti (19 February 1937 â€“ 26 July 2020) was an Italian actress. She was born in Campobasso, Italy. She was known for her role as Dr. Natoli in the 1969 comedy Il Prof. Dott. Guido Tersilli, primario della clinica Villa Celeste, convenzionata con le mutue. Giannotti died on 26 July 2020 in Torino, Italy at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors
title: Claudia Giannotti
